p:
10. Cleo Anastassopoulou, et al
67
An epidemiological data of Hubei, China, was collected from January 11 to February 10, 2020.
The data were used for estimation of basic reproduction number using a Susceptible Infected Recovered Dead (SIRD) framework.
The estimated average value of
R 0 was ~2.6 based on confirmed cases.
